name: places/ChIJo0d8FLxZwokRKkSpUM-Uu2A
formattedAddress: 1115 Broadway Suite 1229, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1115 Broadway Suite 1229, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
I cannot rave about the services provided by Josh and Alan enough. This is my FIRST time apartment searching and it was so important that I found a place to fit the needs of my children. During my apartment search, I put a deposit on another apartment and that broker ghosted me. Josh was very personable and it didn't simply feel like a business transaction. After ten minutes of touring the apartment, Josh and I were talking about family upbringing, and our love and admiration for our mothers.He even mentioned- at this point we're extended family. That was very reassuring. Not only were they super supportive and patient with my situation, they helped me find my perfect home. They are very much goal oriented and solution focused. Even when we hit roadblocks- the wheels in Alan's head were constantly spinning and searching for remedies. They were very caring and efficient. From the date I put in my application, to the day I got keys- was a total of five business days. I had been apartment hunting for months and they got it done in FIVE days.
Their conversations were organic in nature and they have this intrinsic motivation to be exceptional realtors. They kept me up to date on every aspect of the process- text, phone, email, etc. -no matter the time of day- they were responsive. Yes, there's money exchanged at the end but I sense that both Alan and Josh get their satisfaction from providing quality service- and that can't be taught, it's an innate personality trait. I found them completely by accident but I am eternally grateful.

originalText.text: Four months ago (August 2023) our only daughter headed up to NY from FL to commence her grad study at Columbia School of Engineering. We contacted Mr. Josh Hernandez in our desperate search for housing. Josh showed up as scheduled and he spent the entire afternoon walking around and showing us various units. What an amazing experience it was. Although my daughter elected to join other roommates in another housing unit, we will forever be appreciative of the sincerity, humanity, and decency displayed by Josh as he walked and chatted with us throughout the neighborhood. Thank you sir. We'll never forget you.

originalText.text: Alan and Josh were great.  I had an urgent need to find an apartment for my son the week of Thanksgiving.  They returned my calls promptly and were very knowledgeable about the community and available options.  I would highly recommend!

text.text: Alan and Josh were great.  I had an urgent need to find an apartment for my son the week of Thanksgiving.  They returned my calls promptly and were very knowledgeable about the community and available options.  I would highly recommend!

originalText.text:
I cannot recommend Josh and team highly enough. He has demonstrated exceptional professionalism and diligence as our real estate agent. When we tasked him with finding a suitable tenant for our rental property, he approached the job with the utmost dedication. His comprehensive knowledge of the market and potential renters ensured we found the perfect tenant quickly and without a single hitch.

Throughout the process, Josh was communicative, transparent, and extremely efficient. He not only understood our needs but also anticipated potential hurdles and effectively navigated through them, making the entire procedure a breeze.

His incredible attention to detail and impressive negotiation skills significantly set him apart. He was determined to achieve the best possible outcome for us, and he did just that. The peace of mind knowing our property is in good hands is priceless.

If you're looking for a real estate agent who provides seamless service, takes your needs seriously, and delivers results beyond expectations, Josh and the Pinpointe team are your go-to professionals. We are so grateful for his work and would not hesitate to engage his services again. 5/5 stars without a doubt!

originalText.text: Alan and Josh are the best realtors I've ever met! They were extremely helpful and treated us as people and not just numbers. They were very understanding of our needs, and were willing to work with us in any way to accommodate them. When we got rejected from our first apartment, they immediately found us a better alternative and helped us get our application in ASAP. I've already talked to all my friends about PinPointe Group and would always recommend them to anyone else in search for a home in NYC :)
